spec.name: Amuzeum
spec.description: Amuzeum is a family-friendly educational play park and children's museum located in Dar Bouazza, near Casablanca. Spanning nearly 2000 mÂ² across three levels, its mission is to make learning fun for children aged 18 months to 12 years by encouraging them to touch, experiment, and explore. It offers a unique concept in Morocco, combining the joy of an amusement park with the educational value of a museum, with activities designed to awaken curiosity in subjects like history, science, and knowledge.

access.comment: Fees are for one accompanied child (under 7) or unaccompanied child (over 7); one accompanying adult is free.
